---
name: 🖊ODP Vote
about: To track ODP votes
---

## Vote
I am requesting a vote to ...

Do you approve ... ?

## Reactions
👍 - approve

👎 - deny (please add comment explaining why)

👀 - abstained (please add comment explaining why)

## Due to
I'd ask you to cast your vote with 72h (3 days).
